sentences.originalSentence: There, he met a girl and had 3 kids, 2 girls and a boy.
He legitimized the boy but sent the girls to a nunnery.
The mom remarried but Galileo stayed on good terms with them.
Eventually, Galileo came out as a strong supporter of heliocentrism, AKA the belief that the planets revolve around the sun.

0276521f1c314a638a4679e3f5b69b77.text: Eventually , Galileo came out as a strong supporter of heliocentrism , AKA the belief that the planets revolve around the sun .
